      • enqueue

        java.lang.String enqueue(ClipboardPage message,
                         EnqueueOperationConfig config)
        With the given message and config, the message is enqueued to the delayed table
        Parameters:
        message - To be enqueued
        config - EnqueueOperationConfig
        Returns:
        String itemID for the enqueued message, which is then used while dequeue or update of the message

        Returns:

      • repair

        boolean repair(java.lang.String itemId)
        Repairs an item which is in broken and requeues it without creating a new itemID. This api retains the existing accessGroup in item. This api also clears error details before requeuing.
        Parameters:
        itemId - Item ID to repair
